DOC.criteria: Healthy men age 1865 year old ; normal borderline semen analysis ( sperm concentration > 10 million/mL , sperm motility > 30 % , sperm morphology > 3 % ) ; willing engage sexual activity ( alone partner ) least per week duration study ; capable provide semen sample . Clinically detected varicocele ; oligoasthenoteratospermia azoospermia semen analysis ; ongoing attempt initiate pregnancy ; current sexual dysfunction ( classified moderate bad IIEF ) ; history seizure disorder ; history previous chemotherapy radiation therapy ; current psychiatric history history bipolar disorder ; family history bipolar disorder , depression , suicide ; use psychotropic medication anticonvulsant ; use sleep pill per week ; use hormonal medication daily intermittent basis precede 3 month ; use medication may affect hormone measure and/or sexual function ; inability read , follow instruction , complete questionnaire English ; consumption tobacco illicit drug ; consumption > 2oz alcohol daily .
